name: 🐌 Leather Keychain – “Forward is Forward”
description:
by Violet Oceanus | Handmade in Lithuania

💬 Product Description:

Stay inspired—no matter your pace—with this artisan-crafted leather keychain engraved with the motivational reminder:
“Your speed doesn’t matter, forward is forward.”

Made with genuine Italian vegetable-tanned leather and a brushed steel faceplate, this keychain combines durability with meaning. The minimalist snail illustration underscores a powerful truth: steady progress still counts.

Perfect for gifting or grounding your daily routine, each keychain is handmade in Lithuania and designed to age beautifully with time.

🎨 Available Colors:

Black
Brown
Light Brown

Each version features the engraved quote on the front and a subtle Foxy’s Craft logo on the back.

📦 Details:

Materials: Vegetable-tanned Italian leather, stainless steel plate
Dimensions: Approx. 2.5” x 1.5” (not including ring)
Processing Time: 2–3 business days

🚚 Shipping Info:

USA & Australia: 8–14 business days
